body.name: USB C Mini Karaoke Microphone, ASMR Microphone with Stand for Android Phone, iphone, Laptop, Tablets, Portable Tiny Mic for Voice Recording, Singing, Interviews, Vlogs (Silver)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: [Clarity Recording Sound] The mini microphone's high sensitivity allows it to capture sounds from all directions, providing a 360-degree audio experience. Whether you're recording a podcast, conducting an interview, or capturing ambient sounds, this microphone ensures that every recording sound is picked up with clarity and precision. The sound quality after recording is consistently excellent, delivering clear and immersive audio that enhances your recordings.

[Type C Jack] Designed with a Type-C jack, this mini microphone offers wide compatibility with a range of devices. It is specifically tailored for smartphones, tablets, and laptops equipped with a USB Type-C jack. This versatile compatibility ensures that you can use the phone mic with various devices, including Android phones, iPhone 15 and more. It eliminates the hassle of finding specific adapters or connectors, making it convenient and user-friendly.

[Plug and Play] The singing microphone is incredibly easy to use, making it accessible for users of all levels. Simply open the singing or karaoke app, plug it into the phone with type c slot, and then connect the headphone to the spare 3.5mm port. There's no need to connect to a power supply. This plug-and-play functionality allows you to start recording or singing instantly, saving you time and effort.

[Durable & Portable] Crafted from premium aluminum alloy, this mini portable microphone combines durability with elegance. Its robust construction ensures long-lasting performance, capable of withstanding the demands of frequent use. The nylon braided string is tangle-free, ensuring that the tiny microphone is ready for use whenever you need it. Its compact and lightweight design adds to its portability, allowing you to carry it effortlessly in your bag or pocket.

[Multi-Purporse Use] The mini microphone is a versatile tool that can be utilized in various scenarios. Its applications range from singing and recording to street interviews, vlogs, YouTube content creation, and more. Whether you're a musician, a content creator, or simply someone who enjoys singing, this microphone caters to your needs. And its attractive appearance and excellent sound quality make it an ideal gift for individuals who have a passion for singing or content creation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Omnidirectional Capture The mini microphone excels at capturing sound from 360 degrees with its omnidirectional capture feature. It is capable of sensing weak sound waves with excellent frequency and high sensitivity, ensuring premium and high-fidelity sound quality. Effective noise reduction system can also immerse you in a mini karaoke atmosphere, delivering clear and clarity sound. Compatible with Most of APP Compatible with a wide range of apps, including TikTok, YouTube, Smule, Yokee, StarMaker, The Voice, and many others. Its universal compatibility allows you to share your love for music and enjoy high-quality audio capture and recording on most apps available on your device. 5 Colors Optional With five colors to choose from, you can select the one that best matches your unique aesthetic. Whether you prefer classic black, sleek silver, stylish rose gold, vibrant blue, or bold rose red, the mini microphone allows you to express yourself while enjoying its exceptional sound performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent sound from such a tiny mic! Don’t worry about the size, it’s the sound that’s important
reviews.reviewText: What can I say about 2 mini mics to karaoke & the ability to save, and share—completely worth $16! It wasn’t just because it was inexpensive—but this mini mic has incredible excellent sound for such a tiny mini mic!?When I received it I said to myself “there’s no way this is going to work!” But I’m glad my worrying was for nothing!On Sunday June 21, I went onto my enclosed porch, download a karaoke app, set up the mic & cords and I was ADDICTED singing for HOURS!! Early afternoon until 10 pm!!I had contracted the ‘virus’ back in late March until April and hadn’t sang for so long, and I knew my vocal cords did have problems—but as I practiced over & over I finally sounded great close to 10 pm!This little dream mic helped me forget and helped my self esteem in a very long time—for that reason & more—I highly recommend from kids to adults! I promise you’ll love singing & listening to yourself & just taking one step at a time!! 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, budget friendly mic!
reviews.reviewText: I love that this is a small microphone and was pleasantly surprised at the sound quality. Also, my order was missing the mic stands. I reached out to the seller, and they were very responsive. They fixed the issue, and now I have mic stands. If you need a cute little mic with decent sound, this is worth buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and good sound quality!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't realize that these microphones are NOT output. Meaning, they do not work on a karaoke machine. They can only be used to record. But, overall the quality and price of the microphones are really good for what they are so I ended up keeping them. And they're super cute because they're miniature!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work with iphone
reviews.reviewText: It comes with no adapter or plug that will work with an iPhone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommend to any youtuber
reviews.reviewText: I've tried this microphone in my YouTube videos, the color is beautiful and I love it!! No issues at all, came very promptly. Two microphone, two stand and a black bag are included. The quality is truly remarkable in this price bracket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It worked ok but it just seemed cheaply made.
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my granddaughter for Christmas but I returned it before giving it to her. The microphone case was flimsy and easily pulled apart. I downloaded an app and plugged it in. It worked fine. Just didn’t suit me for gift giving

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mini Microphone for your Phone!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to make videos on my phone with a microphone. Great if you’re doing a school project video like an interview or a TikTok that needs a microphone to hear you better. Worth the price and doesn’t break easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Either im stupid or its broken!!
reviews.reviewText: The damn thing does not work. Truly you need the karaoke app to even get it to work and its INCREDIBLY DISAPPOINTING. I wanted to record myself talking on youtube or on the podcast app and its just makes static sounds and you cant hear yourself AT ALL!!!! please for the love of god someone help me. I truly cant figure it out. It even says in the description you can use it for both things i mentioned so it would be nice to get clarity from the producer.
